website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and not too tight thanks to lace-up uppers, though they can wear out after a few weeks of steady use.
pros: Easy to slide, spin, and twist
Hold together well through hours of rehearsal
cons: Once they begin to wear out, these shoes don’t last long

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great for the price. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is becuse the sizing for me was way off. I normally wear a 7 shoe. I went with some reviews that said to size up, and had to retun them. They were way to big. I now have a size 6 and if I was going off of dance shoe etiquette, where the shoe is basically another set of skin, I could have gone down at least another half shoe size. But these are for cosplay and not a perfomance and they are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Order your street shoe size
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING for the price. I ordered 12 pair for my dance company, for a performance 6 days away. I did 2-day shipping and they arrived on time, packaged well, and I had no sizing issues. I ordered everyone’s street shoe size. I DID NOT GO UP OR DOWN. I will update with a pic of the team wearing them. They all loved them and I’ll definitely be ordering again in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE STATES

customer_reviews.title: Love these for dance practice when I don't feel like ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these for dance practice when I don't feel like practicing in heels. I even wore these for social dancing the other night, and I decided I'll get another pair-- one for social dancing and one to leave at the studio. Gender neutral. They look cute and aren't too hot. Several other people at my studio got these after I wore them for a week or so, and everyone thinks they're very comfy. They form to your feet over time, and seem to be holding up even with several practices a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A Markwardt

customer_reviews.title: Great for Salsa Dancing!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these jazz shoes to replace an identical pair I bought from a different website. I love these shoes! They are inexpensive, fit well, and meet my dancing needs. I use them for Salsa/Bachata dancing since I prefer to dance in flats and needed something that would allow me to spin/turn easily. I expect to replace them in the near future as they are not really durable but I'm totally okay with that given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kema619

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is difficult
customer_reviews.text: The sizing system is difficult at best. If these are to be worn as dance shoes, they should fit like second skin, but that's hard to do with the information provided for sizing: "Little kid"? "Big kid"? "LEN??" It's only when it arrives in the mail that you see that the European sizes, which are typically fairly accurate, are included, but only inside the shoe (not on the website). I purchased one, which was baggy; returned for the next smaller size, returned them and just gave up, because the event that I needed them for was the next day. They're pretty cheaply made, so they might hold up for a few wearings.
customer_reviews.author: E. Goodling

customer_reviews.title: Dance jazz boot
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable. I could have ordered my size of 8.5 but I ordered them a half size bigger so I can put extra foot padding supports in them. I probably could have still ordered my regular shoe size and still been able to put a pair of support cushions in them. Currently I have 1 thin layer and 1 thicker layer and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Fb12

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for women's size 9/44.
customer_reviews.text: Great for dance practice. The heel is made of a hard rubber-like material covered by leather. Does not hurt heel in any way. Seems to add protection to heel. I've used 2x so far and I love them. I have enough space in toe bed that I can wear with socks.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo

customer_reviews.title: Good jazz shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoe laces were super long so I bought the elastic tieless shoelaces that worked great. The material isn't the leather like a normal jazz shoe but my 7 year likes them and they are comfortable. At first, she felt they were kind of slippery due to the bottoms but wore them in and they are good. We bought 2 more pairs for the other girls in her trio number. Good product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifert3

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, bad sizing chart
customer_reviews.text: Great product, terrible sizing chart! It makes no sense. I bought in us sizing but it came with European sizing AND us sizing on it...so far no problem...but in trying to return a couple pair (I bought them for a whole class) the sizing chart says a European 41 is a us 10....my shoe's label says a European 41 is a us 8! So confused.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: They are bigger than expected. I wear a 7.5 which is what I ordered but they're too big. The bottom of the shoes are grey, I'd prefer it was all red. I'll be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amber J.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a production of Newsies for my daughter. They were great! Worked exactly as she needed and the show was wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: C. Black

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I must wear them with socks because the material is hard for my feet but I love them, great for Chacha practice. The only thing I dislike is the smell, I got them today put them in my purse and it smells like, I don't know what... The material is just smelly but not in a chemical way is more of like not treated leather smell... Besides that the shoes are perfect and I am happy. Arrived on time. I truly like them
customer_reviews.author: Maria T.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have many dance shoes but these are my go to shoe as they are incredibly comfortable ... like dancing in bare feet but with some (light) protection. Not for dancing when you are concerned you will be stepped on, however. As the fabric is light .... so worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: GiniRae

customer_reviews.title: Had to reorder- recommend a size down
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size in my experience. Ordered my regular 6.5 and they were absolutely huge- I thought maybe they just sent the wrong size but I replaced for a whole size smaller and the reorder fits like a dream. Happy with the quality for price so far and the fit is perfectly snug (hard to find sometimes for how narrow my feet are)
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my first ever musical which was Mary Poppins Jr. I didn't have a lot of dancing parts so I can't say how they were for that. We rehearsed usually on carpet and sometimes on wood flooring. They are still in good condish! Only down side for me would be that their's literally no support for your feet, so if you have have bad feet (like me lol) I would recommend putting inserts in! That solved the problem for me. Also a friend has that same shoes as these and she says that they are great too! I will defiantly be buying these again when I grow out of my current ones!
customer_reviews.author: otmom

customer_reviews.title: Follow the size chart
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three pairs of these ranging in size from boy's 4 to men's 10. I ordered according to the size chart and got a perfect fit all three times. One user of these shoes has sort of narrow feet and another has sort of wide feet. These are soft enough to accommodate the wide foot and can be laced up well-enough to accommodate the sort of narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Ok Practice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit bigger than expected. It has a much larger fit than I am used to. Dance shoes should fit like a glove; definitely not a Capezio, but OK for a practice shoe. I had to buy inserts for arch support and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbis

customer_reviews.title: Great Jazz Boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these canvas jazz boots for my daughter. She loves them! They were a little slippery on the dance floor at first but through use and using rosin they are fine. Great buy. My daughter wears a size 4 and we ordered true to size and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: April G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for her school play
customer_reviews.text: I measured my daughters feet and used the size chart for reference. She normally wears a size 3 in kids and I order a size 5. Perfect for her school play.
customer_reviews.author: Lucero Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Ok for cheap boots
customer_reviews.text: It was ok for the price. I wore one of these and a higher quality dance boot in black as part of a costume and these were noticably less comfortable. The leather sole sections were too small to cover the bottom of the foot. And the soles are not red as in the photo, I had to color them with a red Sharpie.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy boots
customer_reviews.text: I like these but the laces were missing. When I called customer service they said I could replace the boots but they couldn’t send laces. I’ll keep them but not thrilled I have to go get laces.
customer_reviews.author: PippaMom

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I would buy again to wear for an outdoor parade where a lot of walking is required
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't all that happy with this dance shoe. My daughter had a parade and they had to wear these and she claimed her feet were hurting afterwards. If its something for indoor I may purchase again but not for outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a costume. I intended to wear these outside so I put insoles in them to make them more study and bought some traction pads for the bottom of the shoes. They were the perfect cherry red color for my costume and with the modifications I made, they were perfect for outside use! (as long as it doesn't rain!)
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Eyelets started coming out after about 6 hours of dancing. OK if you put a sole in them. Just canvas fabric with suade stitched on the heel and ball of foot.
customer_reviews.author: KDinSTL

customer_reviews.title: Have some cusions for the ball of your foot
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a dance number. Could not tell a left from the right until tried on. After on and laced up, the ball of the foot had no cushioning and was so hard had to put inserts into them. They were fine after that
customer_reviews.author: bobbi cochran

customer_reviews.title: Ok.....
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is fine except it pinched and hurts my pinky toe for a clothe shoe that’s kind of uncomfortable. I’m hoping that it will break in and stop doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Cooper

customer_reviews.title: wore down quickly
customer_reviews.text: I do really like these and they aren't bad for the price. However, they are wearing out really fast. I got these brand new for a musical I did, wore them for 3 weeks of rehearsals and by the time we opened sections at the bottom had wore through :(
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put these on and walked around, my feet began to hurt because the inner edge of the heel was jamming into my foot. These are in no way usable! I had to file a return.
customer_reviews.author: SlothQueen

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved the fit and style
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed some jazz shoes for the Waiter's Dance in "Hello, Dolly." These were perfect since they looked like a boot and worked with her black pants that were part of the costume. She loves these and will probably choose them as her preferred jazz shoes over a pair of regular low top jazz shoes when she needs them again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Way Better Than I Expected!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fairly inexpensive so I anticipated a similar quality! I was totally wrong. I love these boots! The laces are spaced perfectly, so they fit like a glove. Because the canvas breathes, they aren't smelly! They pack down and fit with my performance costumes perfectly. Great purchase! I'll definitely buy these boots again.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dance performance shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for character shoes in a play , they were super practical for Leaps and turns as they have a split ballet slipper sole They performed without distracting from the costume just a basic color match. These will be our new go to for future performances
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart easily
customer_reviews.text: I loved these when I first bought them because they're basically just an extra skin, however, they dont last very long. The seams on the sides of the heel start coming apart pretty quickly and the little lace rings start to fall off. I've been using mine for 2 months now and they're all torn up already.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my apprentice cosplay! These are great for dance and great for a medieval outfit. I wouldn't recommend wearing outside if its wet. Only wear outside if its dry!
customer_reviews.author: ElementZero Cosplay

customer_reviews.title: Not my best choice
customer_reviews.text: Does not stand up to wear and gets uncomfortable quickly. Had to put sole inserts in but it was still pretty uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Cute dance shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The size 8 fits my wide 7 1/2 foot perfectly. They are just what I need for dance. Flexible and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It about what I expected. A little snug because it isn't wide enough. Husband is wearing for Daughters wedding will be putting insoles on for more cushioning. other than this Id say its a very good product. its for custom so it is going to work out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Baehr

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sizing—Stick with street measurements
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dance practice! I ordered my street shoe size and they fit brilliantly. I’ll be hand sewing black thread around the grommets so they aren’t bright silver but otherwise a perfect shoe for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Decent well made shoe, although only one shoelace
customer_reviews.text: I original ordered the red pair and they were canvas. I then returned and reordered the black pair but these are more like leather. The biggest issue is that I was sent one shoelace with them.... I'm not exactly sure how it happened because it was all prepackaged. Now I'll have to separately buy shoelaces. Rather disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Maple Leaf Rag

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad shoe but very wide in the front, my foot is narrow and is sliding inside even when I tie it up. Also, the bottoms feel a bit too gripy for my liking
customer_reviews.author: Eliza K.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable & they breathe. Soles are thicker than the pleather ones I bought. No arch support bc it’s not suppose to. I recommend buying a gel insole for everyday dancing or theater use.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Too small but stretching
customer_reviews.text: I knew they would be tight as I am a mens 11W, but OUCH! Also, I could swear that the left shoe was SMALLER then the right as it was tighter and really hurt...but for 13bucksi can suffer, and since they are canvas they are stretching a lot. Thank god.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a ghost costume. They were comfortable for the whole night
customer_reviews.author: faeryfriendz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy ****
customer_reviews.text: My randdaughter is very happy with this shoe. She performs in 'The Nutcracker' next week.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Sagewoman 42felliott

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but I couldn't wear these for more than an hour, by then my feet were killing me. It's basically just fabric, a couple of thin padding at the heel and toe and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a dancer. I'm a shoe hound! I just love them. They fit and look better with socks.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel J. Shelhamer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful fit and very comfy!!! I got these to use for historical costuming (Regency) and not only do they look gorgeous, they fit perfectly true to size. I wear an 11 and often have trouble buying shoes online, but these were great. I'm recommending them to my costuming friends as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brigid R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Shoes!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my daughter, as she is on the dance team for the marching band at school. They arrived just in time for a band battle. These shoes are made of very poor quality as the seems connecting the soles came undone causing gapping holes!!! Totaling unsafe and embarrassing!!! We will never order from that supplier again!!
customer_reviews.author: Ericka J Brown

customer_reviews.title: These are for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing in the description or title when I ordered this that said it would be toddler sizes! It fit my 2 year old, but I had thought I was buying shoes for me. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfortable dance shoe
customer_reviews.text: Use for dance practice very comfortable! Cute high top material is better then I thought would receive. Again being a dance shoe hoped it would be more sturdy though for the money very nice
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Those had strands of white dog hair on them. I don't even own a dog. The stitching on the shoes on the bottom was not properly done well. I wasted my money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brynea

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected <3
customer_reviews.text: I did not size up or down. I wear size 6 in dance shoes and so I bought size 6 and they fit perfectly. They comfortable, light weight, flexible and look just as like the picture provided by the seler.
customer_reviews.author: L.Anaid

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to sizing and you won’t go wrong. Worked well for my daughter’s performance.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal L.

customer_reviews.title: No insolea
customer_reviews.text: No support on the bottom, so you can feel the seams.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: Great soles but fits a little snug around toes.
customer_reviews.text: The picture display the shoes well. The size, was just smaller than expected. Also, the fabric that makes up the shoe is fairly thin. But the soles of the shoe are great! ... just wish they fit a little longer. I ordered a half size bigger. Should’ve ordered an entire inch bigger instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the price. It was as expected and work well for a beginner dancer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these.
customer_reviews.text: I wear them till they fall apart. nice during the summer for people who hate wearing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for costume
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what these are meant to be for. I bought for a costume and they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this whole shoe! I don't use them for dancing. I wear them just casually. This is probably the fifth pair I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi Miller

customer_reviews.title: good for practice
customer_reviews.text: I will have to wear thicker socks with these, but I like the leather on the bottom which is just where I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Fit just right
customer_reviews.text: I'm always nervous about buying shoes online but these fit perfectly and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Nice quality shoes, very soft and my daughter likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jingh L

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: You dont need to order a size up. These are true to size. I ordered up and they are too big for my girls and very very slippery. Double sided tape should take care of that. Overall they are good shoes. Ordering more for the team.
customer_reviews.author: Kemitashi Austin

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They fit to size & look so cute! <3
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Sizes do not conform to universal standards
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that these run larger than normal universal standards. We ordered twice and both sizes were far too big. It is impossible to know what size will actually fit until you buy them all. We just gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really good I used them for a production of The Wizard Of Oz. They lasted the whole show and did not rip. I would buy them again and everyone loved the fact that they were boots.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo A.

customer_reviews.title: Not cool!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was not a good quality the stud on the hole lace was missing u get wat u pay. Too much hassle to deal with so i just kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these cotton lace up dancing shoes were perfect. I found them super comfortable and I'm getting ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these cotton lace up dancing shoes were perfect. I found them super comfortable and I'm getting ready to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: self-employed

customer_reviews.title: I really like them, but they run big and the heel ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like them, but they run big and the heel and toe are falling apart. I have used them for dance lessons for my wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie Claybaugh

customer_reviews.title: Keep all of your packing slips I am bags in case you have to return it.
customer_reviews.text: The product was thinner than I expected and fit loose even though it was my size.
customer_reviews.author: Waterfall  Wise

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: although I am not a dancer these days, I like the ankle support and the look. Wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Knittinginor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Used as part of elf costume. They made her feel like dancing! The red ones were perfect with the elf constume.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Lace-up canvas dance shoe makes a great shoe for Victorian costume
customer_reviews.text: I used the Lace-up Canvas Dance Shoe as [art of my Victorian costume.
customer_reviews.author: Gem State  customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sizing and look are both great. After 1 dance practice, my feet hurt like crazy, so I don't think I'll wear them again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: SHUT THE FRONT DOOR
customer_reviews.text: IM NEVER TAKING THESE OFF OF MY FEET EVER AGAIN first of all they fit like a damn glove. super cute i’m in love
customer_reviews.author: dom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These were great for what I needed them for but they run a little big, they feel like normal dance shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Red Blood Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and they were perfect. Seemed to fit true to size and are very soft, just like the slip on jazz shoes. She loved these!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great dance shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great dance shoe I’m so happy that I found this on snazy
customer_reviews.author: karen roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just love .had to order in black and white. Very comfortable!! Perfect for Mime ministry!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Glad customer

customer_reviews.title: Dance boots
customer_reviews.text: My daaughtef lives these. They are super cute and very comfy for dancing
customer_reviews.author: Siris629

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable you will love them
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these shoes it's very comfortable.i walk in them I got compliments
customer_reviews.author: Leon veal

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, seems durable, comfortable to wear. Great shoes for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: These canvas dance boots are exactly as I hoped. Now, I can more smoothly work creating dance moves. Great. Can hardly wait to purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Wandersforever

customer_reviews.title: Warning: these aren't meant for adults
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 10 in women and ended up getting shoes tiny enough to almost fit my 1 1/2 year old. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Smith

customer_reviews.title: but I think they will work just fine. They are a little bulky but with socks ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not been dancing in these yet, but I think they will work just fine. They are a little bulky but with socks they feel okay. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: hnd4e

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well and they are still in good condition after extensive dancing for a couple weeks! Can’t wait to use them more!
customer_reviews.author: Jamee

customer_reviews.title: I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were an awesome fit! I thought they would be loose for me who fits in 10’s, but it worked out really well!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Frey

customer_reviews.title: Low price low quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price they worked good but they didn't last the whole theater production that we got them for.
customer_reviews.author: OBowles

customer_reviews.title: Fit well. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My son wears jazz shoes for theater. He loves them and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good costume shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, practical, fit and arrived as expected, and good for any costume.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyyyyyyyyyyyyy too big i bought a size US 7 and it fits like a size US 9
customer_reviews.author: Chanell

customer_reviews.title: Solid Shoes for a Busy Gal
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I bought them for a cosplay and they work perfectly. If you are purchasing these, realize that they are a dance shoe and not meant for walking outside.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong ones I wanted the ones with out the silver on them they were supposed to be all black
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the size chart suggests and missing a lace.
customer_reviews.author: Mac W. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: After one use they were already falling apart. Kind of sad because they fit perfectly and were somewhat comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but weird size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter. While she loves the style & the material, the size seems off. She is a women's size 9; I ordered according to the directions, but they are too big.
customer_reviews.author: rdadad

customer_reviews.title: They seem pretty good so far
customer_reviews.text: They seem pretty good so far, but given that I have only tried them once, I will hold off on giving a glowing review. They seem comfortable so far. I like that they can lace up, because even if the shoe is a little big, my foot is held in place. It feels just like wearing socks which makes it really nice for dancing salsa.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chau.

customer_reviews.title: Kid size , maybe.
customer_reviews.text: Slow delivery & not women's size as says. Ordered women's size 11. The ones I got will not even fit 4year old niece.
customer_reviews.author: michelle Zera

customer_reviews.title: Great material for the price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. I have wide feet and these fit perfect 👌🏽 I will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

product_meta.title: NLeahershoe Lace-up Canvas Dance Shoes Flat Jazz Boots for Practice, Suitable for Both Men and
feature_bullets: NLeahershoe Please refer to the left size table, and select the corresponding size according to your feet length. If you have wide and thick feet, please choose a larger size. Our shoes are made of environmentally friendly materials, please feel rest assured for wearing. It’s normal for new leather shoes to have a little pungent smell, but the smell will gone naturally after one or two days ventilation.
